data.name: AdjacentParticipationAfter
data.value: There is another Participation for this Contact with the same Level starting one day after.

data.name: AdjacentParticipationBefore
data.value: There is another Participation for this Contact with the same Level ending one day before.

data.name: AnotherParticipation
data.value: There is another Participation for this Contact within this period.

data.value: There is another Participation Fee Exemption for this Contact within the same period.

data.value: There is another Participation Fee Rule within the same period.

data.name: AnotherSettings
data.value: There are already another active Settings.

data.value: {0} fields {1} are read-only.

data.value: Cannot manually create a Transaction.

data.value: Marking {0} of {1} transactions as non-payment...

data.name: ParticipationFeeExemptionFromGreaterThanTill
data.value: Participation Fee Exemption From must be less than or equal to Till.

data.name: ParticipationFeeRuleFromGreaterThanTill
data.value: Participation Fee Rule From must be less than or equal to Till.

data.name: ParticipationFeeRuleFromNotFirstDayOfMonth
data.value: Participation Fee Rule From must be a first day of the month.

data.name: ParticipationFeeRuleTillNotLastDayOfMonth
data.value: Participation Fee Rule Till must be a last day of the month.

data.name: ParticipationFromGreaterThanTill
data.value: Participation From must be less than or equal to Till.

data.value: Processing the transaction...

data.name: ScheduledJobPostponeUntilLessThanExecuteOn
data.value: Scheduled Job Postpone Until must be greater than or equal to Execute On.
